description: A plastic printed copy of Glock 19, a popular handgun already known for its mostly-plastic construction. Barrel and firing pin are made out of high-quality polymer compound, able to weather gunfire significantly better than regular plastic. Less reliable than its market counterpart, but an effective firearm if you have nothing else available.

A plastic printed copy of SIG Sauer P226, popular with law enforcement organizations around the world. Barrel and firing pin are made out of high-quality polymer compound, able to weather gunfire significantly better than regular plastic. Less reliable than its market counterpart, but an effective firearm if you have nothing else available.

A plastic printed copy of M1911, a highly-successful handgun with a long history of employment. Barrel and firing pin are made out of high-quality polymer compound, able to weather gunfire significantly better than regular plastic. Less reliable than its market counterpart, but an effective firearm if you have nothing else available.
